Meet Billy!

Hi friends, I'm Billy! Guess what, I have a twin sister Bella! She's really cool, but she's nothing like me. We are so different that I wonder how we're even twins! Sometimes I give her a hard time, but that's so she'll toughen up. I love my sister.

I enjoy discovering new species of creatures. Give me a bug and I'll dissect it to learn all about it. I learn a lot from my Dad, especially when we go fishing. My mom said I can get a fish tank next year. How awesome is that?

What's Billy up to today?

Billy's Baseball Adventures: Math Lesson 1

Read More
  • More About Billy
  • Things Billy Loves
  • Things Billy Dislikes

My favorite adventure is visiting the aquarium! When I'm not discovering animals, I'm at the skate park! I meet so many new friends here. We get to show off our skateboards and see who has the highest jump. My parents are afraid I'll hurt myself, but I convince them that I'm a big boy and I can handle the scratches.

A little secret about me is that I'm afraid of heights. That's why I never win the highest jump! It can be embarrassing but I make up for it by telling jokes or doing magic tricks. My friends love it! Some day I'll conquer my fear of heights.

Well, enough about me. I'm excited to learn all about you!

  • Skateboarding
  • Magic tricks
  • Adventure
  • Building model cars
  • Playing video games

Spring is my favorite season because its baseball time! I play on a Sluggers team.

In the Summer, we spend a lot of time at the beach. My sisters and I build sandcastles together. Sometimes we even bury my parents in the sand!

When Fall comes, I help my dad rake leaves. I always jump right back in them and that makes him laugh! I also love Halloween! I always scare my siblings with my spooky costumes.

During Winter, I love sledding down big hills and having snowball fights with my big brother, Jax!

What are your favorite things to do?

  • Doing chores. (My parents say it's just part of growing up.)
  • My biggest fear is heights. I do not like climbing too high or big roller coasters. As I grow up, my family helps me overcome these fears.
  • Going to the dentist.
  • Getting shots! Why are needles so big anyway?

What do you dislike? Are you afraid of anything?

Hi there James! I have so many favorite animals, it’s hard to choose! I think my favorite would be the mighty whale. Thanks for asking!

What a great question, Sam! I’ve caught a couple, but we always let them go. I thought they were pretty slimy too! Fish are cool.
